thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Tom Cutler
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Tom Cutler

author: Tom Cutler
title: Tom Cutler
text: Best service provided by far out of all the drop shipping sites, good selection of products all at very reasonable prices. Please don't expect fast shipping, which is nearly always free, as the stuff is being sent from China. I've had a couple of faulty items in the past and customer services have been very responsive trying to troubleshoot the problem and have replaced the items without issue. The app is very good, nearly all functionality is covered from within the app, I rarely have to go to the website to do anything. I will continue to shop with Banggood.
